name: The Lone Rocketeer
description:
* I recommend playing on Chrome, firefox has some issues locking the mouse on the center of the screen

Here is a little two week project I've been working on, I kinda really wanted a rocket building game in first person, so I did just that!

Send some probes into deep space! track them visually, or look through their eyes with the Camera probe!

Make bigger rockets! and eventually launch yourself into space with the Capsule!!!

The controls are in-game

It is compiled for 64 Bit Windows and WebGL, but I can compile it for linux/mac if anyone would prefer that! (Leave a comment)
